title: Eastern bankshares announces $30B merger with HarborOne, strengthens Boston market share
excerpt: Eastern Bankshares' Q1 2025 earnings call unveils its HarborOne Bancorp merger, boosting assets to $30B.
text: Earnings Call Insights: Eastern Bankshares (EBC) Q1 2025 Management View The company announced a definitive merger agreement with HarborOne Bancorp, a $5.7 billion bank headquartered in Brockton, Massachusetts.
